input.sentences: all dressed up and somewhere to go !
my bride and i are off to the annual halloween block party .
the real party begins at 11 | when all the kids are sent to bed and the adult party begins .
an always popular game is put the clown nose on your partner with out using your hands .
unfortunately | this year 's party came to an early end with a sudden rainstorm . no worries | we will be back next year !
output.sentences: We were dressed and ready for the costume party.
My partner was my bride for the halloween party.
The party was so real and so full of excitement we felt like kids.
My partners nose was quite popular.
We were worried since all of a sudden we had a rainstorm.
